alert.note: Alert for Fayette Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 6:34AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE...SOUTHEASTERN MONONGALIA...TUCKER...PRESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 633 AM EST, snow showers in the area are resulting in local rapid reductions in visibility and quick coatings of snow on roadways at times. Especially over the higher terrain in the ridges of West Virginia. Locations impacted include... Fairmont, Kingwood, Parsons, Terra Alta, Davis, Rowlesburg, Pleasant Valley, Winfield, Barrackville, Newburg, Hendricks, Hambleton, Rivesville, Grant Town, Reedsville, Masontown, Albright, Tunnelton, Hannahsville, and Everettville. This includes Interstate 79 in West Virginia between mile markers 135 and 148. Use extra caution if you must travel this morning. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents.
